title: Most important export partner countries for Brazil in 2017
summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share in total export in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Share in total export 21.8 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Netherlands where Country is 4.3.
Country China has 5.07 times more Share in total export than Country Netherlands which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share in total export in each Country on the y axis.
The Share in total export is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Netherlands.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share in total export in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Share in total export 21.8 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Netherlands where Country is 4.3.
Country China has 5.07 times more Share in total export than Country Netherlands which is has the lowest.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share in total export for 4 number of Countrys.
Country China has the highest Share in total export and Netherlands has the lowest Share in total export.
There is a difference of 17.5 between the maximum Country China and minimum Country Netherlands.
Share in total export at Country China is 21.8 , second place is United States at 12.5, and thirdly is Argentina at 8.1.
The Country China tends to be 1.87 percent higher than average.
The Share in total export is 46.7 if we add up values of all Countrys.
